page.title: 03POLEGATE TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content:
ON WEDNESDAY 26 JUNE 1985,FOUR OF US WENT TO THE A22 TO DO A TRAFFIC SURVEY FOR THIS PROJECT. THE A22 IS A VERY BUSY MAIN ROAD RUNNING FROM EASTBOURNE TO LONDON, PASSING THROUGH THE WESTERN EDGE OF POLEGATE.
WE WATCHED FOR 30 MINUTES AND COUNTED THE NUMBER OF MOTORBIKES,BRITISH CARS, FOREIGN CARS AND OTHER VEHICLES.
MOTORBIKES 26 > BRITISH CARS 595 > FOREIGN CARS 177 > OTHER VEHICLES 172 > TOTAL - 970
WE NOTICED THAT FORD CARS WERE THE MOST POPULAR ; FRENCH AND JAPANESE CARS WERE THE MOST POPULAR OF THE FOREIGN CARS. THERE WERE A LOT OF COACHES ON THE ROAD AS WELL.
